'''Crimson Cyclone''' is an unusually large and discolored [[Onikabuto]] that was captured by [[Paimon]]. Due to its size, it is able to easily flip other Onikabuto on their backs. It is currently owned by [[Daisuke]] as his pet. It appears in {{Quest|The Oni's Justice}}.
